# Can I Cook It?
> A community recipe platform where anyone can generate a custom recipe from whatever ingredients they have. Every recipe is built by real people and added to a growing community collection.

## What this site does
- Generates custom recipes from user-provided ingredients using AI
- Hosts a growing library of community-generated and curated recipes
- Covers all cuisines, dietary requirements, and skill levels
- Recipes include full ingredients, method, nutritional info, and community photos

## Recipe pages
- Curated recipes: canicookit.com/recipes/[cuisine]/[slug]
- Community recipes: canicookit.com/recipes/community/[slug]
- All recipes include: title, description, ingredients, method, prep/cook time, serves, calories, dietary tags

## Guides
- canicookit.com/guides — How-to guides for cooking techniques and entertaining

## Generate a recipe
- canicookit.com/generate — Enter ingredients, get a custom recipe instantly
